ygData.subject: Re: Rune of Banding
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail all this is my first day on the mailing list so please excuse my ignorance.  But I did go back and look for an answer in about 10 of the previous Digests.
ygData.messageBody:
Hail all this is my first day on the mailing list so please excuse my
ignorance. But I did go back and look for an answer in about 10 of the
previous Digests. So here is my question now.

Ok I have a rune of Faldwyher. What are these things? I've herd rumors
that they are used in Spell Research but can anyone verify this?

Lomack

>Message: 25 Date: Tue, 27 Apr 1999 16:19:41 EDT
>From: SPRUSBRUCE@...
>Subject: Re: Rune of Banding
>
>You can find many different runes in the goblin warroir camp in the
butcherblok mountains >on the islan of Faydwer. 7th lvl wiz Ardan the
Mysterious Tunare server
>
>
